newsitem.title: USA: Most US stock index futures up, new Sept S&P high.
newsitem.headline: Most US stock index futures up, new Sept S&P high.

text.p: July 7 - U.S. stock index futures were mostly higher in morning trade. Sept S&P 500 hit fresh record high at 932.25, after 931.00 high set overnight. Traders said action light to moderate as market eyes strong bonds. Resistance at 935.00 and 937.50, traders said.
